Text:
Installation Instructions:
==========================

1. Mount .ISO using e.g. PowerISO and run setup (Application) or extract contents of .ISO using e.g. WinRAR or 7zip and run setup (Application).
2. Once installed, disable A/V and/or firewall and run Microsoft Toolkit.exe
3. Click on the Microsoft Office TAB (Bottom right of Toolkit, 1st of the 3 TABS).
4. Now click on the Activation TAB, make sure AutoKMS is selected from the drop down menu and then click on Activate.

If Office is not activated on the first try, you may need to run the above activation procedure a couple of times until product is activated.

ENJOY AND SEED!!!

Please refer my previous comment...I re-tried with a different method.

1. In the Activation Tab, select KMS Server Service and Install/Activate. Windows popped up a message stating that firewall has blocked some features. Click on Allow Access.
2. Then select  AutoKMS and Activate. 

It worked and the office got activated..

Thanks a lot.

installed on windows 7 pro x64. worked perfectly~

1. mount iso & installed office
2. off my anti-virus
3. ran the ms toolkit
4. click on third button from right (office logo)
5. select autokms & press install, then activate
6. ran windows update & it dled the updates :o
